name: Candy Runner (scratchinartist)
description:
Candy Runner is a simple runner, where you can only jump by pressing on space. You can go faster if you eat candies, but be careful, if you eat too much, you'll be slow down. You have two minutes to go as far as possible.

This game was made for the trijam 98 in nearly 5-6 hours.

I'm sorry, it would be simpler if the game was available on WebGL, but the builds take really long and my pc is overheating, so I prefer build for Windows.
